page.title: 09LOCAL EMPLOYMENT IN CROYDON
page.content: The main centre for industry in our area is along the Purley Way. We have found some isolated factories in various side streets and offices in the London Road, but the largest complex is around Commerce Way, Trojan Way and Purley Way. Many people we spoke to thought that an area for industry was a good thing for local employment. The transport to the area has been improved and pollution and rubbish is easier to control.There is some heavy industry in the area - boiler manufacturers and the Ford Car Plant. Most factories are in- volved in light industry,e.g.X-ray App- aratus, Paper, Tape and Card factories, Ribbon, Confectionary, Plastics, Dyeing and Cleaning. There are also warehous- ing facilities, and Fuel Distribution Centres. A few factories are empty, but there are very few vacancies on the em- ployment boards outside the factories.
